document.full_text: "american idol" is the darling of tv advertisers, dwarfing other tv shows by raking in an estimated $7.11 million every half hour last year for the fox network, according to a forbes.com survey.
document.title: "american idol" king of tv advertising revenue
lines_and_colors: "american idol" is the darling of tv advertisers, dwarfing other tv shows by raking in an estimated $7.11 million every half hour last year for the fox network, according to a forbes.com survey.
